headline: Blackstone pres. on 2026 tailwinds: 'The deal dam is breaking'
summary: Blackstone (BX) stock is under pressure after the company reported third quarter earnings. Blackstone president and COO Jonathan Gray joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss the earnings print. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Why Blackstone (BX) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of alternative investment manager Blackstone (NYSE:BX) fell 4.1% in the afternoon session after the company reported mixed third-quarter 2025 results, with a significant miss on profit per share overshadowing strong growth in revenue and fee-related earnings.

headline: Blackstone Beats Earnings, Misses Profit. Stock Sinks
summary: Blackstone (BX) beat analyst expectations for earnings and revenue when it reported third quarter results ahead of the market open on Thursday. The stock dropped nearly 3% at the market open. The investment giant delivered earnings of $1.52 per share, a 29 cent increase compared to the $1.23 analyst expected, according to FactSet. Quarterly revenue came in at $3.09 billion...

headline: Blackstone (NYSE:BX) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q3 Earnings
summary: Alternative investment manager Blackstone (NYSE:BX) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, but sales rose 26.6% year on year to $3.09 billion. Its GAAP profit of $0.80 per share was 34.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
